data.name: Yoltrund: The World of Eternal Woe - Original Story
data.detailed_description:
The twisted Hell that is Yoltrund


Do you want to see the original story that inspired the game Yoltrund? You can now! For free, download the original story for your reading pleasure.

• Please note – The Yoltrund: The World of Eternal Woe story will be placed in your Yoltrund folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Yoltrund

Yoltrund: The World of Eternal Woe


Lost in a world of fire, stone, and death, one young man must find his way out and the only way out is deeper into the Hell of flame and death.

Throught his journey, he must purify the corruption within him so he does not suffer the fate of the sinners he meets in Yoltrund. This world burns with anger and fury, shrouded in shadow, with a heart colder than ice. He must reach the centre in order to be set free from this torment.

With The Master as his guide, will he return to the Light or succumb to the Shadow?

The Story


The story is divided into 10 chapters known as "Cantos", each Canto describing a different area of Yoltrund. The story is presented in its original form and writing as it was when it was first written 3 years ago in 2015.

This content is provided for free to download with purchasing Yoltrund.

data.legal_notice:
This work is rated M - Mature by the Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) and is not intended for audiences under the age of 17. This work is rated M - Mature for content related to violence, blood, strong language, and sexual themes.

This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the author’s imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Developed by Michael Cox, published by Templarius Studios.
